question.title: Last Digit of a number
question.content:
Given an integer n. Write a program to print the last digit of the number. Also, move the cursor to the next line.

Examples:

Input: n = 10
Output: 0
Input: n = 9768
Output: 8

Constraints:

-109 ≤ n ≤ 109

rephrased.body: Given an integer n, write a program to print the last digit of the number and move the cursor to the next line.

hints: Take absolute value of integer and then do modulus by 10.

solutions.full_func:
#Back-end complete function Template for Python 3

n = int(input())

# code here
ans = abs(n) % 10

# Print ans
print(ans)
